"You can't be serious." Kim said as she looked at the flyer Monique was showing her. Bueno Nacho was sponsoring an eating contest.
"Come on it'll be fun and there's a huge prize for the winner." Monique said.
"And what makes you think one of us can win?" Kim asked.
"I may not look like it but I know how to pack it away." Monique boasted prompting a skeptical look from Kim as Monique patted her trim stomach. "Or is Ms. I can do anything worried I finally found something I can beat her at."
This perked Kim's interest.
"All right I can't back down from a challenge like that you're on."

choices: Ann was in the nude, staring seductively at her daughter.
Ann was swallowing James, who was attempting to reach something on the table.
A burglar was in the house, stealing anything not nailed down!
154.content:
Kim slowly dragged her feet inch by inch towards her home. Today had been an awful day, just plain awful! Bonnie had been really pushing her luck today, it was just insult after insult AFTER INSULT! And THEN, Bonnie had the NERVE to slap her! Kim Possible! The girl who saved the world countless times! But did that matter to Bonnie? NO! It was a good thing Ron stepped in, a second later and Bonnie would've been nothing more than a bloody mess on the floor!

Sighing, Kim finally reached her door and noticed it was unlocked. Puzzled, the girl slowly opened the door and peered in. Kim gasped at the sight before her!
154.title: Kim X Ann Possible
